mapper.select: select * from notice where 1=1 and NOTICE_TITLE like concat('%', #{notice_search}, '%') and NOTICE_CONT like concat('%', #{notice_search}, '%') order by NOTICE_PIN desc, notice_num desc

select * from notice where 1=1
AND notice_date >= #{notice_start}
AND notice_date <= DATE_ADD(#{notice_end}, INTERVAL 1 DAY)
and NOTICE_TITLE like concat('%', #{notice_search}, '%') order by NOTICE_PIN desc, notice_num desc
mapper.insert: insert into notice values( default, #{notice_title}, #{notice_cont}, default, 0, #{notice_pin} )
mapper.update: update notice set notice_readcount = notice_readcount+1 where notice_num= #{notice_num}
update notice set notice_title = #{notice_title}, notice_cont = #{notice_cont}, notice_date=curdate(), notice_pin=#{notice_pin} where notice_num = #{notice_num}
